ai-atk-s0403a38:1_0: He enjoys the five cords of sense desire for the sake of passion, for the sake of all sensual desire.
ai-atk-s0403a38:2_0: Discussion of the proper conduct for the upper garments
ai-atk-s0403a38:3_0: The Book of the Sixes is finished.
ai-atk-s0403a38:4_0: Reverence to him, the Fortunate One, the Worthy One, the Perfect Sambuddha
ai-atk-s0403a38:5_0: if it is the upper limb.
ai-atk-s0403a38:7_0: Rottom the leaf-hut was (and then) after he fell into the sky.
